channel.title: [PI] help with itemdef.java [vine whip]

item.title: [PI] help with itemdef.java [vine whip]
item.dc:creator: @wolvesyoungy wolvesyoungy
item.description:
@wolvesyoungy wrote:

can any one help me with adding items i added it but now ive got 14 errors :s

case XXXX: itemDef.modelID = 2429; itemDef.name = "Whip vine"; itemDef.modelZoom = 760; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 552; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 28; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 2; itemDef.stackable = false; itemDef.value = 50000; itemDef.membersObject = true; itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[4] = "Drop"; break;

my errors

case 20000: itemDef.modelID = 10247; itemDef.name = "Abyssal vine whip"; itemDef.modelZoom = 848; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 324; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1808; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 5; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 38; itemDef.stackable = false; itemDef.value = 50000; itemDef.membersObject = true; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 10253; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 10253; itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.actions[2] = "Split"; itemDef.actions[4] = "Drop"; break; 
case 20001:
	itemDef.modelID = 2429;
	itemDef.name = "Whip vine";
	itemDef.modelZoom = 760;
	itemDef.modelRotation1 = 552;
	itemDef.modelRotation2 = 28;
	itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
	itemDef.modelOffset2 = 2;
	itemDef.stackable = false;
	itemDef.value = 50000;
	itemDef.membersObject = true;
	itemDef.actions = new String[5];
	itemDef.actions[4] = "Drop";
break;</blockquote>

what im adding

soo any help i will be gratefull for thanks guys
